要點防

打塔攻，發現第一座塔時（多數射木）馬上搬位，然後起返坐塔防佢，之後用木牆封鎖對面路線。上封後出馬打鳩對面陣地，派1 個村封金封石。

更新出到beta 5.3
一世都唔會beta完

https://steamcommunity.com/app/221380/discussions/0/135511757695145451/

Patch Notes - 5.3 (Open Beta)
Thank you for participating in the Open Beta Program! Based on your ongoing feedback we have identified a few additional AI improvements which we would like to include before full release. Due this these additions we will be rolling the Patch 5.2 improvements forward and combining them with the new Patch 5.3 fixes, being made available now.

As we mentioned earlier, we want to continue to provide insight into the road ahead as we maintain focus on community issues and bug fixes. For what’s coming next, please take a look at this future patch plans discussion thread!

Again, thank you for your support and we look forward to hearing more of your feedback!

Btw, 有咩bug記得上去講, 佢地聲稱會mon住個forum

https://steamcommunity.com/app/221380/discussions/0/135511757695208612/

Future Patch Plans
Thank you for providing feedback and participating in the Open Beta Program! As we mentioned earlier we will continue to cycle future patches through open betas to give you, the community, an opportunity to provide feedback on a regular basis and help shape the game.

Over the next few months we are planning to release consistent updates that focus on issues encountered by the community. As we launch Patch 5.3 into open beta we will continue to monitor the forums and prioritize issues while beginning work on the next patch. Patch 5.4 will address additional campaign bugs and focus on custom scenario issues.

Future patches will continue to address your feedback and currently Patch 5.5 will look into lobby improvements and audio bugs whereas Patch 5.6 will focus on further AI bug fixes.

Based on your ongoing feedback we will continue to make adjustments and monitor the forums. Please let us know what you think in this disucssion thread and we look for forward to hearing from you!

Beta版又有更新
Open Beta Update – March 22nd
We have just launched a small update to the Open Beta branch so please restart Steam to get the latest version. In this update we’ve addressed three additional issues based on your feedback. Thank you for your support.
Repeatedly pressing hot keys during loading screens will no longer crash.
Using standard AI and the original dataset will no longer randomly crash.
Removing a unit from a queue should no longer randomly crash.

好唔明點解佢重製嗰時唔成個引擎改良
隻game需求唔大,但人口一多就會lag,照計而家既技術要改應該唔難架

我玩唔係steam版本果隻aofe

d 電腦難打到仆街
crusade係咁輸
睇下horde 點打 點知horde負碌贏
明明horde 冇兵 crusade 成隊兵
horde 係正crusade面前起城堡 crusade唔打村民
俾佢起到座城堡 跟住打左兩個鐘靠城堡守贏

btw 好想打贏d電腦 係咪一定要steam先同到你地玩？

或者守到後帝基本都可以贏到8成
